selections.name: Ready Marea
selections.reason: Won debut impressively at this track and distance on soft going. The clear standout with proven form under these conditions.

selections.name: It'sall About Mary
selections.reason: Drops in class from Eagle Farm. Represents a strong stable and should improve sharply here.

selections.name: Another Champers
selections.reason: First starter from the Kendrick yard. Trialled well and draws the inside gate.

selections.name: Ironroad Spirit
selections.reason: Local debutant who has shown ability in trials.

danger_horse.name: It'sall About Mary
danger_horse.reason: The main threat if she brings her city form to the provincial circuit.

selections.name: Obligated
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick after two strong wins. Beat key rivals last start and carries a manageable weight.

selections.name: Pipistrelle
selections.reason: Won well fresh at Mackay. Drawn the rail and has good stats at this stage of preparation.

selections.name: Cherry Rose
selections.reason: Class runner of the field but has to carry a big weight (137lbs). Still a major player.

selections.name: Tizso Fab
selections.reason: Consistent type who finished 2nd to the top pick last start. Light weight helps.

danger_horse.name: Pipistrelle
danger_horse.reason: Maps to get a perfect run from barrier 1 and has winning form.

selections.name: Belvedere Miss
selections.reason: Solid 2nd at Mackay last start. Looks well placed in a weak maiden field.

selections.name: Better Go Torque
selections.reason: Kendrick runner who should strip fitter. Expected to improve over 7f.

selections.name: Notforthemoney
selections.reason: Clinton Taylor stable has a high strike rate. Can improve on recent form.

selections.name: Leica Flamingo
selections.reason: Has been racing consistently without winning. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Better Go Torque
danger_horse.reason: Stable has a great record at this track.

selections.name: Our Eagle Rock
selections.reason: Resuming. Has won fresh before and represents the leading Kendrick stable.

selections.name: Krackacan
selections.reason: Another fresh performer with good stats. Drawn well.

selections.name: Kai Mondo
selections.reason: Consistent runner who is rarely far away. Drawn the rail.

selections.name: Gotta Hero
selections.reason: Won last start. Scratched from Race 7 to run here. Respect.

selections.name: Answering
selections.reason: Coming off a good 2nd. Consistent type in this grade.

selections.name: Keyboard
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last start. Has the ability to win this.

selections.name: Canny Be Better
selections.reason: Solid 3rd fresh. Will be fitter and draws well.

selections.name: Miss Mercy
selections.reason: Kendrick runner. Can improve.

selections.name: Our Heart Throb
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Carries a light weight (119lbs) which is a big advantage.

selections.name: Lease
selections.reason: Consistent recent form. Drawn the inside and maps well.

selections.name: Chaparral Chase
selections.reason: Manzelmann runner who could improve here.

selections.name: Our Turn Now
selections.reason: Class runner but hampered by huge weight (142lbs).

danger_horse.name: Lease
danger_horse.reason: Honest campaigner who won't be far away.

selections.name: Limero
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from BM68/70 grade to Class 2. Scratched from Race 6 to run here. The one to beat.

selections.name: Ten Carat Lucy
selections.reason: Good 2nd last start. Racing well and looks the main threat.

selections.name: Melo Melo Kava
selections.reason: Consistent type who is usually in the money.

selections.name: Marellity
selections.reason: Scratched from Race 4 for this. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Ten Carat Lucy
danger_horse.reason: In good form and meets the top pick with a weight advantage.
